tool_description: API for scraping anything from YouTube. Search , download, crawl anything. Get videos, subtitles, community posts, comments. NO age or geo restrictions.
name: YouTube Scraper 2023
title: YouTube Scraper 2023

api_list.name: Get Playlist Details / Videos
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get the full data of a playlist, including its full video data.

api_list.name: Get Suggestions / Autocompletions
api_list.description: Get YouTube suggestions or autocompletion for a phrase, keyword, or search query.

api_list.name: Search for Video / Playlists / Podcast / ...
api_list.description: Perform a search on YouTube and get the data you need.

api_list.name: Search On Channel
api_list.description: Perform a search for videos or playlists on the channel.

api_list.name: Get Channel Community Posts
api_list.description: Get all the community posts on the channel

api_list.name: Get Channel's Featured/Subscribed Channels
api_list.description: Get all the featured or subscribed channels on the channel.

api_list.name: Get Channel Podcasts
api_list.description: Get all the podcasts on the channel

api_list.name: Get Channel Playlists
api_list.description: Get all the playlists on the channel

api_list.name: Get Channel Live Videos
api_list.description: Get all the live videos on the channel.

api_list.name: Get Channel Shorts
api_list.description: Crawl through a channel's short videos and get its data.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The "sortBy" is how you want the videos to be sorted. There are two options: Latest and Popular. By default, videos are sorted by "Latest".

api_list.name: Get Channel Videos
api_list.description: Crawl through all the videos on a channel and get its data.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The "sortBy" is how you want the videos to be sorted. There are three options: Latest, Popular, and Oldest. By default, videos are sorted by "Latest".

api_list.name: Get Channel Details
api_list.description: Get the details of a channel.  Send a post request to this endpoint with the channel ID. You can pass it as a "JSON" or "FORM" body.

api_list.name: Get Video Transcript
api_list.description: This endpoint enables you to get the transcript of any YouTube video

api_list.name: Get Video Comments
api_list.description: Get all the comments on a video.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: The nextToken  is provided by the previous requests. That's if the data you query has more to be fetched; otherwise, it's null. In this case, the nextToken allows you to fetch more comments.

api_list.name: Get Related Videos
api_list.description:
Access a curated list of videos related to a given video ID, facilitating content discovery and recommendations.
The request method is POST, and videoId is required. Optionally, you can add the "nextToken" to fetch the next videos. Once you add "nextToken", you can ignore videoId.

optional_parameters.name: nextToken
optional_parameters.description: The nextToken  is provided by the previous requests. That's if the data you query has more to be fetched; otherwise, it's null. In this case, the nextToken allows you to fetch more related videos.

api_list.name: Get Video Details
api_list.description: Retrieve various details about a video, including download links, descriptions, the title, and more.
